snippet: The ashes of Richie Havens, who opened the Woodstock festival in 1969, will be scattered over the site of his performance later this month.
abstract: The ashes of Richie Havens, who opened the Woodstock festival in 1969, will be scattered over the site of his performance later this month.

headline.main: A Final Return to Woodstock for Richie Havens
headline.print_headline: Richie Havens’s Ashes To Fly Above Woodstock
